content:
Here's some sample content written in this app.

I'm able to bold, italicize, or both.

Besides that though, aesthetics are irrelevant; here, I'm typing my thoughts in a stream-of-consciousness format.

The concept is simple but the results are awesome. Can't wait for people to use this.
